result.reason: Implement a feature to allow importing connection details from a simple text file into mRemoteNG.
result.approach: Add a new menu item 'Import from Text File' within the PortScanWindow or a similar import-related UI. Implement a new deserializer, TextListDeserializer.cs, conforming to the IDeserializer interface, to parse the provided text file. This deserializer will read each line, interpret it as a connection string (e.g., hostname, protocol, port), and construct ConnectionInfo objects. These objects will then be added to the ConnectionTreeModel. Comprehensive unit tests will be created for the new deserializer.
